description: The Discovery Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Discovery Ski Area for the snow report
Alexa, ask Discovery Ski Area for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Discovery Ski Area
shortDescription: The Discovery Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Discovery Ski Area.
